com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.state.scene

Class ExtendedGamescene

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.state.scene.BaseGamescene
      • com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.state.scene.ExtendedGamescene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IExtendedGameScene, IGameScene
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalMapGamescene, LocalMapGamestate.EmptyLocalMapGamescene

    @RequiresInjection
public class ExtendedGamescene
extends BaseGamescene
implements IExtendedGameScene
    Use as an extended base for game scenes.

    • Method Detail

      • injectExtendedDependencies

        @Inject
protected void injectExtendedDependencies(IWorldspace worldspace,
                                                  ICameraController.ICameraControllerFactory cameraControllerFactory,
                                                  IPlayerController playerController,
                                                  IMapController mapController)
        Injects all extended dependencies for the scene.

        This method will be called after injection of BaseGamescene.

        Note that this method will be called before any method injections of subclasses.

        See Also:
        initExtendedDependencies(), initExtendedSceneDependencies(com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.world.IWorldspace, com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.controller.ICameraController, com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.controller.IPlayerController, com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.controller.map.IMapController)
